    • rangeAngleToTransform

      public static Transform2d rangeAngleToTransform(double rangeM, double angleDeg)
      Returns a WPILib transform representation of a position offset expressed in range and angle using the FRC coordinate system
      Returns:
      Transform2d with x and y components reflecting the range and angle

    • distanceTo

      public static double distanceTo(Pose2d first, Pose2d second)
      Returns the distance in meters between two 2D positions
      Returns:
      Distance in meters

    • bearingTo

      public static double bearingTo(Pose2d first, Pose2d second)
      Returns the bearing angle in degrees between two positions. The rotation elements of the poses are not considered
      Returns:
      Bearing in degrees from first to second pos position

    • robotBearingTo

      public static double robotBearingTo(Pose2d first, Pose2d second)

    • courseSpeedToLinearVelocity

      public static ChassisSpeeds courseSpeedToLinearVelocity(double courseDeg, double speedMetersPerSecond)
      Converts a course and speed to its x and y components. The returned value will have zero angular velocity
      Returns:
      ChassisSpeeds object with x and y velocities for the specified course and speed

      public static double getChassisMagnitude(ChassisSpeeds speeds)
